Html:
Hi,

Does Quickgraph support manipulating graph (e.g. adding/removing edges/vertices) from non-UI thread? If yes how?

Regards,
Pahlevi Fikri Auliya
That question should be asked on the Quickgraph forum. I don't if it dispatches the events back to the thread where you have subscribed from, you should ask that from Peli. :)
